Atkins is a ketogenic diet - low carb intake results in the liver converting fat into fatty acids; ketones, instead of sugars,deliver energy to the body. Paleo diets dictate that we not eat any type of food that wasn't available before the advent of agriculture.

Whatâs the Difference Between Paleo and Keto? In the end, the main difference between Paleo and keto is one of emphasis. Keto emphasizes being in the state of ketosis whereas Paleo emphasizes food quality. In practice, most folks on a Paleo diet eat a much higher amount of carbohydrates than those on a ketogenic diet.
